data.title: Labels
data.text:
Casablanca Records Australia

Casablanca Records Australia keeps Casablanca’s proud tradition of releasing music that combines immense talent, credibility and success. Offering dynamic and progressive Australian indie-electro and electronic artists the opportunity to tap into Universal Music’s worldwide network, its growing roster includes Just A Gent, Running Touch, and St. Albion. You can visit Casablanca Records Australia’s official website here at http://www.casablancarecordsaustralia.com/

Decca Label Group

The Decca Label Group is home to some of the leading classical and opera stars, including Renée Fleming, Luciano Pavarotti and Joan Sutherland, as well as crossover stars such as Andrea Bocelli and Sol3 Mio. Its instrumentalists include Benjamin Grosvenor, Leonidas Kavakos, Andreas Ottensamer and its Australian roster includes best-selling soprano, Greta Bradman. You can visit Decca Label Group official website here at www.deccaclassics.com.

Dew Process

An indie record label based in Australia, Dew Process release records from some of Australia’s best and most acclaimed artists, as well as licensing awesome international releases for Australia and New Zealand. You can visit Dew Process official website here at dew-process.com.

EMI Australia

EMI Music Australia has been an iconic label in the Australian music industry for 75 years, supporting and nurturing Australian talent, both established and emerging.

As a cornerstone of Australia’s music scene, EMI Music is renowned for its dedication to artists and its global reach. Our label brings together diverse talents, including Troye Sivan, Paul Kelly, The Avalanches, Something For Kate, Meg Mac, and Alison Wonderland, Empire of The Sun, Keith Urban, Gretta Ray, Missy Higgins, Birds of Tokyo, Kate Miller-Heidke, Slim Dusty, Nick Ward, and many more.

www.emimusic.com.au

Golden Era Records

The new home of the Hilltop Hoods, Briggs, A. B. Original, Funkoars, ADFU, Vents and more… This label wasn’t established to release throw-back records; instead they hope to make music that throws you back to the way you felt during the golden era of Hip Hop, whenever that was for you. You can visit Golden Era Records official website here at goldenerarecords.com.au.

Island Records Australia

Island Records Australia represents some of Australia and New Zealand’s most loved and critically-acclaimed artists, including Boy & Bear, Hilltop Hoods (Golden Era), Havana Brown, Gin Wigmore, The Naked & Famous, Broods, The McClymonts, Thundamentals and Tame Impala (Modular). And up & comers like Vera Blue, Dean Lewis, and Cloves. You can visit Island Records Australia official website here at www.islandrecordsaustralia.com

Lost Highway Australia

Lost Highway Australia is the premier alternative country, americana and roots music label in Australia, New Zealand, and the Pacific region, with its current roster including Shane Nicholson, Ruby Boots, Catherine Britt, Imogen Clark, Jason Walker, and Adam Eckersley Band – all inspired by the amazing legacy of Lost Highway Records US. You can visit Lost Highway Australia official website here at www.losthighwayaustralia.com.

Neon Records

The Australian based, Grammy nominated and multiple ARIA award winning label, headed up by Smiley Cleary and Carl West, is home to some of the world’s finest electronic music artists. Since launching almost a decade ago, the label has been instrumental in breaking acts like Skrillex, Rudimental, Icona Pop, Knife Party and Milky Chance and has enjoyed success working with an array of exciting artists over the years including David Guetta, Gorgon City, Felix Jaehn, Hot Natured, Adrian Lux, Klingande, Ivan Gough & Feenixpawl, Sidney Samson, Alex Adair & many more. You can visit Neon Records official website here at neonrecords.com.au.

Of Leisure

Yoyos, Ping Pong, Putt Putt (and any activity that repeats itself), Visors, Lilos, Frisbees and those colourful umbrellas in cocktails; These are just a few things that Sydney electronic label Of Leisure like to get amongst. The other is music, more specifically electronic music that takes your inhibitions and buries them deep in the sand. The home to some of Australia’s most exciting young electronic music artists like Young Franco, MUTO, GRMM and Tyler Touché. You can visit Of Leisure official website here at ofleisure.com.au.

Central Station Records

Central Station Records, Australia’s longest running independent record label pioneers the best in house, electro, trance, urban and hard dance music. Giving you the most cutting edge local and international talent, CSR continues to pump out top selling compilations, artists albums, EPs, DJ mixes, events and more. You can visit Central Station Records official website here at www.centralstation.com.au.

Liberation Music

Liberation Music is a boutique, independent Australian record company, started in 1999 by Michael Gudinski and Warren Costello, based in Melbourne. Its stated aim is to find, nurture and then to develop new talent for a world market while remaining independent in the process. You can visit Liberation Music official website here at www.liberation.com.au.
